titleStmt.title: The vvhoremongers conuersion, and his exhortation to's worshipfull friend, to leaue haunting whores; from his words this wasptenn'd: and at his request, which makes the author bolder: it is to be sung like The maunding souldier.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Good your worship cast your eye ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
